Module com.cis3296.virtualchess
Package com.cis3296.virtualchess.Components

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.cis3296.virtualchess.Components.Board
public class Board extends Object
An 8x8 Grid the contains all the BoardSquare and Piece to play a game of chess

  • Method Details

    • getSquareAt

      public BoardSquare getSquareAt(Coordinates coordinates)
      Indexes into the boardSquares arraylist to get the desired square
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The Coordinates where you want to access a board square
      Returns:
      The BoardSquare at the coordinates or null if not found

    • getPieceAt

      public Piece getPieceAt(Coordinates coordinates)
      Gets the square at the coordinates and looks for pieces as children to that square
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates for where to look for a piece
      Returns:
      Piece at the coordinates or null if the square doesn't have a piece

    • rerenderBoard

      public void rerenderBoard()
      Goes through all the BoardSquare on the Board and sets the colors of them This is used when changing the theme in settings to make sure the new color is applied

    • addPiece

      public void addPiece(BoardSquare square, Piece piece)
      Adds a given Piece to a given BoardSquare Only For setup
      Parameters:
      square - the target boardsquare
      piece - the piece that will be added

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int col, int row)
      Checks if the move to a square is valid
      Parameters:
      col - Destination BoardSquare column
      row - Destination BoardSquare row
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid false otherwise

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int col, int row, Piece targetPiece)
      Another version of isValidMove that uses the targetPiece
      Parameters:
      col - Destination BoardSquare column
      row - Destination BoardSquare row
      targetPiece - The Piece that is being moved
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid false otherwise

    • isValidCoordinate

      public boolean isValidCoordinate(int col, int row)
      Checks to see if the coordinates are valid on the board
      Parameters:
      col - column the Piece is being dragged over
      row - row the Piece is being dragged over
      Returns:
      true if valid, false if not valid
